title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama: chat, generate, embeddings, tool-calling, structured output.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: chat UI, model management, multi-user, RAG, plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with async, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama HTTP API for Rails & plain Ruby apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI tool for chatting, pulling, and benchmarking Ollama models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal Next.js chatbot UI wired to Ollama via the ollama-js SDK.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: RAG, function-calling, fine-tune, LangGraph, Autogen, CrewAI examples.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate, refactor, and chat with code using Ollama models.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js middleware that exposes an OpenAI-compatible REST API over Ollama.

title: ollama-keras
summary: Keras 3 callback that streams Ollama-generated text during training for dynamic reporting.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes.

title: ollama-databricks
summary: Databricks notebook init script + REST proxy to run Ollama on GPU clusters.

title: ollama-rag-qa-bot
summary: Streamlit app for PDF Q&A using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that chats and generates images via Ollama.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize, translate, and brainstorm notes with Ollama.
